message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1800000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1200000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $1600000. This is the best I can do, and I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.

Thank you for your willingness to compromise, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your offer. However, I am still unable to meet at $1600000. My maximum budget remains at $1200000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
